fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Communication
eu_initiatives: Evidence -based for policy-making; Common Foreign and Security Policy; Trade policy, TTIP, Competition, Immigration and asylum seekers policy.
organisation_name: European Association for Negotiation and Mediation (EANAM)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication: Capacity building for negotiation and mediation processes;  Evidence -based for policy-making; science diplomacy and public well-being.
goals__remit:
The mission of EANAM (The European Association for Negotiation and Mediation) is to propose negotiation processes and mediation through the development and improvement of technical, interpersonal, and creative skills of main actors who are going to participate to negotiation and mediation processes. 
 
EANAM has been fostering sustainable cooperation through an International network of outstanding distinguished personalities, covering many disciplines of human and social sciences, who can help a better comprehension of the whole range of political and psychological dynamics in the negotiation and mediation processes. To this purpose, EANAM has been promoting activities, studies, researches, training and also the organisation of conferences and events in the field of international negotiation and mediation in a way to join our competencies to rich fixed goals.
